The little pod's door opened and Eyebright appeared, she was deeply 
sleeping and without damage. Starice had had the idea to built that 
little pod for her, in order to protect her in case that Maximal base 
was damaged.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Pacifix noticed it. "What in Primus' name is that?" He knelt down, 
and
> gently examined it.
